article_text:
Don’t have time to read the Washington Post or New York Times? Then get The Morning Bell, an early morning edition of the day’s most important political news, conservative commentary and original reporting from a team committed to following the truth no matter where it leads.

Email address

article_metadata.description: No matter what the EPA says, it is just wrong for an agency to allege violations, impose fines and then garnish wages without a court order.

og.description: No matter what the EPA says, it is just wrong for an agency to allege violations, impose fines and then garnish wages without a court order.
